kubernetes-cluster-config.name: Kubernetes Cluster Config
kubernetes-cluster-config.description:
Stores configuration for interaction with Kubernetes clusters.

See `from_file` for creation. This block is part of the prefect-kubernetes collection. Install prefect-kubernetes with `pip install prefect-kubernetes` to use this block.
kubernetes-cluster-config.code_example:
Load a saved Kubernetes cluster config:
```python
from prefect_kubernetes.credentials import import KubernetesClusterConfig

cluster_config_block = KubernetesClusterConfig.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.description:
Stores configuration for interaction with Kubernetes clusters.

See `from_file` for creation.

config.description: The entire contents of a kubectl config file.
config.title: Config

context_name.description: The name of the kubectl context to use.
context_name.title: Context Name

fields.title: KubernetesClusterConfig

kubernetes-credentials.name: Kubernetes Credentials
kubernetes-credentials.description: Credentials block for generating configured Kubernetes API clients. This block is part of the prefect-kubernetes collection. Install prefect-kubernetes with `pip install prefect-kubernetes` to use this block.
kubernetes-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Kubernetes credentials:
```python
from prefect_kubernetes.credentials import KubernetesCredentials

kubernetes_credentials = KubernetesCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.description: Credentials block for generating configured Kubernetes API clients.
fields.title: KubernetesCredentials
